title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A legendary 35mm film camera introduced in 1954, known for its precision, build quality, and association with classic photojournalism. Highly sought after by collectors and photography enthusiasts.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: An iconic electric guitar used by legends like Angus Young and Eric Clapton. Known for its double cutaway design and powerful humbucker pickups, this vintage piece is a prized item for collectors and musicians alike.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Appleâ€™s first mass-market personal computer with a graphical user interface and mouse. A historical milestone in tech history and a collector's favorite for vintage computing fans.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: A classic luxury dive watch introduced in the late 1980s, known for its durability, precision, and iconic design. This Rolex model is a staple in watch collections and retains strong resale value.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare and valuable first edition of one of the most influential novels in American literature. Coveted by literary collectors and often auctioned at prestigious events.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: An original Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman, designed by Charles and Ray Eames. A masterpiece of 20th-century furniture design, blending luxury with ergonomic comfort.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: A limited edition original screen print by the anonymous street artist Banksy. His works are renowned for political commentary, satirical art, and rapidly increasing market value.
